name: MeanArterialPressure
title: Mean arterial pressure
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents observation of mean arterial pressure.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify an observation of a mean arterial pressure in a patient.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the Physical exam, finding data type.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include codes representing the observation of mean arterial pressure using the LOINC code system.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
